Name: laf the game
About the game: Play as a cute little furry dog, take him for a walk, meet a new world and make him live just like a real dog! Feed him, give him something to drink, collect as many bones as possible. Do what you want with your own dog and try to meet new ones! Adventure is the order of the day for those who embody it. Lots of new maps coming as the game develops! And more dog breeds will be unlocked depending on your score 2D graphics Open world Play as your own discisions
